data.prayer: the county of Hoshiarpur has (about) 17,453 people who know Jesus, 19,251 people who know about him culturally, and 1,549,897 people who are far from Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Hoshiarpur, Punjab, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Hoshiarpur, Punjab, India the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Hoshiarpur, Punjab, India.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Hoshiarpur, Punjab, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Arain (Sikh traditions) people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Arain (Sikh traditions) people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Arain (Sikh traditions) people is yours.
Spirit, help the 17,453 believers find a person of peace today among the 1,569,148 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of Hoshiarpur, Punjab, India will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.

data.section_summary:
the county of Hoshiarpur, Punjab, India has a population of 1,586,600.

We estimate Hoshiarpur has 17,453 people who might know Jesus, 19,251 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,549,897 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Hoshiarpur, Punjab, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
